mapper.select: -- 공지사항 조회(오늘로부터 1년 이내) SELECT notice_sequence ,notice_title ,notice_content ,notice_create_date ,notice_create_user FROM notice WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(notice_create_date,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y%m%d');

-- 공지사항 조회(오늘로부터 1년 이내) SELECT com.com_name AS virus_name ,virus_id ,virus_prevention -- 예방법 ,virus_description -- 설명 ,virus_symptom -- 증상 ,virus_propagation_path -- 감염경로 ,virus_incubation_period -- 잠복기 ,virus_cure -- 치료법 FROM virusinfo INNER JOIN common com ON com.com_id = virus_id WHERE 1=1 AND virus_id = #{virusId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content,notice_create_date,notice_create_user) SELECT #{noticeTitle} AS notice_title , #{noticeContent} AS notice_content , NOW() AS notice_create_date , user_name AS notice_create_user FROM user WHERE user_id = #{noticeCreateUser};
